title: TV Comparison: Sony Z9D Series, Samsung KS9000, and the LG OLED G6P
description:
Find out which TV is the best around in Abt's head to head TV face off, where we compare the Sony Z9D Series, Samsung KS9000 SUHD TV, and the LG OLED G6P TV. Carl from Abt explains all of the pros and cons between three of the most talked about and most anticipated TVs to become available in 2016. Check out the features below to see each of these TVs best features, and don’t forget to shop for them on http://www.abt.com/

Shop at Abt for the Sony 65" XBR Z9D Series 4K HDR With Android TV Smart HDTV - XBR-65Z9D:
http://www.abt.com/product/102974/Sony-65-XBR-Z9D-Series-4K-HDR-With-Android-TV-Smart-HDTV-XBR65Z9D.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=XBR65Z9D_20160915

Shop at Abt for the Samsung 65" SUHD 4K LED Smart HDTV - UN65KS9000FXZA:
http://www.abt.com/product/99093/Samsung-65-SUHD-4K-LED-Smart-HDTV-UN65KS9000FXZA.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=UN65KS9000FXZA_20160915

Shop at Abt for the LG Signature 65" Black UHD 4K OLED 3D Smart HDTV With WebOS 3.0 - OLED65G6P:
http://www.abt.com/product/98195/LG-Signature-65-Black-UHD-4K-OLED-3D-Smart-HDTV-With-WebOS-3.0-OLED65G6P.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=OLED65G6P_20160915

Sony 65" XBR Z9D Series Key Features:
- 4K HDR: the next generation of picture quality
- 4K HDR Processor X1™ Extreme
- Object-based HDR remaster
- Backlight Master Drive™
- Dual database processing
- Super Bit Mapping™ 4K HDR
- Backlight Master Drive™ – Calibrated beam LED design
- Stream PlayStation games straight to your TV
- X-tended Dynamic Range™ PRO: backlight brilliance
- 4K X-Reality™ PRO: enhance every picture up to 4K
- TRILUMINOS™ Display
- Motionflow™ XR keeps the action smooth
- BRAVIA meets Android TV
- Google Cast™: Plays nice with your other devices
- Immerse yourself in 3D
- Cable-free front
- Say what you want to see with voice search

Find out what else the Sony Z9D Series has to offer at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/102974/Sony-65-XBR-Z9D-Series-4K-HDR-With-Android-TV-Smart-HDTV-XBR65Z9D.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=XBR65Z9D_20160915

Samsung 65" SUHD 4K TV Key Features:
- 4K SUHD TV
- Resolution: 3840 x 2160
- Motion Rate: Supreme MR 240
- Exceptional color. Authentic images
- Dynamic brightness reveals hidden details
- Remaster your non-SUHD content
- See small details come to life
- Designed to excite the senses
- Looks great from any angle
- The features you want all in one place
- Incredible moving picture resolution
- Amazing black levels and contrast
- Indulge your inner gamer
- Easily connect share and play your favorite content
- Stunningly vibrant viewing experience
- Dolby Digital Plus
- Smart Hub: Yes

Find out what else the Samsung 65" SUHD 4K TV has to offer at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/99093/Samsung-65-SUHD-4K-LED-Smart-HDTV-UN65KS9000FXZA.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=UN65KS9000FXZA_20160915

LG 65" UHD 4K OLED TV Key Features:
- 4K Ultra HD (3840 x 2160)
- OLED HDR with Dolby Vision™
- Perfect Black Panel
- Cinematic Color
- Ultra Luminance
- 4K Upscaler
- Pixel Dimming
- webOS 3.0
- True Color Accuracy
- Magic Remote Control: Included (Premium + Card Slim)
- Natural Voice Recognition
- Magic Mobile Connection
- Universal Control Capability
- LG Content Store (App Store)
- Full Web Browser
- 3D Glasses: 2 Glasses Included
- Wi-Fi Built In

Find out what else the LG 65" UHD 4K OLED TV has to offer at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/98195/LG-Signature-65-Black-UHD-4K-OLED-3D-Smart-HDTV-With-WebOS-3.0-OLED65G6P.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=OLED65G6P_20160915
